title: NFL Issues Report On Patriots' Deflategate; Brady Probably Knew
teaser: The NFL has released its report on the New England Patriots' scandal that's come to be known as Deflategate. The 139-page report says it's likely that quarterback Tom Brady was aware staff was taking air out of the balls, and thus complicit. How are Patriots' fans taking the news?
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
